Question.Subject: How do I search multiple Craigslist sites?
Question.Content: I am looking for antique and specialty items and I don't care what location they come from. Anyone know of a good site where I can search multiple sites at once?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
It's easy to search multiple craigslist sites you can use http://www.craigz.com you can set your location and distance you want to search.
There are instructions here http://www.ehow.com/how_6029448_search-multiple-craigslist-sites-once.html?shared=true
